name: ComfyUI FLUX Auto-Setup
description: ComfyUI + ComfyUI-Manager + Nunchaku + KJNodes + rgthree-comparer, auto-downloads models and nodes from workflow.json + FLUX Dev/Fill/Context support.

env.name: EXTRA_MODEL_URLS
env.description: Comma-separated list of model URLs to download

readme: Place your workflow.json in /workspace before starting. ComfyUI will auto-install all required nodes and models.
